trigger.Name: trSplav1
trigger.script:
if QuestStatus("Metalfordrey")==Q_TAKEN then FailQuest("Metalfordrey") end
if QuestStatus("DolgRayana1")==Q_TAKEN then FailQuest("DolgRayana1") end
if QuestStatus("DolgRayana")==Q_TAKEN then FailQuest("DolgRayana") end
local Plf = GetPlayerVehicle() Plf:SetCustomLinearVelocity(0) Plf:SetThrottle(0)
TakeQuest("SplavFinded")
AddQuestItem("quest_komp_splav") CompleteQuest("FindSplavKaio") if QuestStatus("FindSplavKaio1")==Q_TAKEN then CompleteQuest("FindSplavKaio1") end getObj("artefact1"):Remove() if getObj("artefact2") then getObj("artefact2"):Remove() end trigger:Deactivate()
